text-node.description: Removes a child account from a parent account. This will only set the child account to disabled, not completely delete it.
Allow an Account Owner to manually create a new user account that will be part of his sub accounts.
This pipeline is used for the manage users AJAX call once a user submits the add new user form
Creates new addresses for the child account by using data from the select parent account's addresses.
Creates new billing addressfor the child account by using data from the select parent account's billing address.
